index.title: UI Component Lab
index.subtitle: All UI wrapped components demo. All components follow Material Design 3 specifications, with styles controlled by a unified theme.
index.showcasesSubtitle: Click to view detailed showcases of each component
index.guideItem2: Direct use of @mui/material or @mui/x-data-grid is prohibited
index.guideItem3: sx or style attributes are not allowed for customizing component styles on pages
index.guideItem4: All styles are uniformly controlled by the theme to ensure visual consistency

buttons.title: Buttons Showcase
buttons.subtitle: Material Design 3 button components - verify consistency and functionality

cards.title: Cards Showcase
cards.subtitle: Material Design 3 card components - verify consistency and layout. All styles are controlled by variant/tone enums.
cards.variantDesc: variant: default (default shadow) | outlined (border) | compact (compact) | config (config form)
cards.defaultDesc: Default card with shadow. Suitable for general content display.
cards.outlinedDesc: Bordered card, no shadow. Suitable for flat design style.
cards.compactDesc: Compact card, reduced padding. Suitable for dense list display.
cards.configDesc: Config card, increased padding. Suitable for form/settings pages.
cards.infoDesc: Info tone. Blue border + 8% blue background.
cards.warningDesc: Warning tone. Orange border + 8% orange background.
cards.criticalDesc: Critical/dangerous tone. Red border + 8% red background.
cards.generalContentDesc: Most common combination. Standard card, general content.
cards.infoMessageDesc: Info card. For documentation, help information.
cards.warningMessageDesc: Warning card. Content requiring user attention.
cards.configFormDesc: Settings/configuration pages. Form container with larger padding.
cards.cardWithActionDesc: Card header can include action buttons.
cards.dashboardDesc: Full-width card, usually used to contain data tables or lists.
cards.noPaddingDesc: Content area has no padding, suitable for DataGrid or other full-width components.
